titleStmt.title: Diseases of the soule a discourse diuine, morall, and physicall. By Tho. Adams.
titleStmt.author: Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Purslowe for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at the great south-dore of Paules, and at Brittaines Bursse,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
